Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class Game

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Game
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Game extends Object implements Serializable
class that manage the logic of the game, receiving messages from the controller to evolve the game

      InvalidPositionsException

    • addInShelf

      public void addInShelf(Tile[] tilesToAdd, Player currentPlayer, int selectedColumn) throws NoSpaceInColumnException
      method that manages places them in the shelf in the selected column.
      Parameters:
      tilesToAdd - tiles to add to the shelf
      currentPlayer - player currently playing
      selectedColumn - the selected column
      Throws:
      NoSpaceInColumnException - throw when the colum has not enough space

    • checkCommonTarget

      public void checkCommonTarget(Player currentPlayer)
      Method that check if the player has completed the two Common objective and if it has already completed them before, and proceeds to add the value of the ScoringToken to the player score, removing it from the card.
      Parameters:
      currentPlayer - the player that is currently playing his turn

    • isShelfFull

      public void isShelfFull(Player currentPlayer)
      method that checks if the player shelf is full,and if it is, begins the last turn and adds the score of the EndGameToken to the player score
      Parameters:
      currentPlayer - The player currently playing

      public boolean isLastTurn()
      Checks if it is the last turn.
